description: A semiconductor manufacturing plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns and predict potential issues before they cause downtime. This is a normal operational scenario where the agent performs as expected.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance based on sensor data from etching, lithography, and ion implantation equipment.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a wafer fabrication facility)
